gyp ERR! configure error 
gyp ERR! stack Error: Python executable "/Users/jesseokeya/anaconda3/bin/python" is v3.6.2, which is not supported by gyp.
gyp ERR! stack You can pass the --python switch to point to Python >= v2.5.0 & < 3.0.0.
gyp ERR! stack     at PythonFinder.failPythonVersion (/usr/local/lib/node_modules/npm/node_modules/node-gyp/lib/configure.js:492:19)

gyp ERR! stack     at ChildProcess.emit (events.js:192:7)

gyp ERR! stack     at Socket.<anonymous> (internal/child_process.js:334:11)
gyp ERR! stack     at emitOne (events.js:96:13)
gyp ERR! stack     at Socket.emit (events.js:189:7)
